meanings.definition: A handsome Trojan prince who was abducted by Zeus to serve as cupbearer to the gods.
meanings.sent1: In Greek mythology, Ganymedes was taken to Olympus by Zeus to pour drinks for the gods.
meanings.sent2: The story of Ganymedes being the cupbearer for the gods is well-known in ancient tales.
meanings.sent3: Imagine Ganymedes trying to balance all those drinks for the gods without spilling any!
meanings.sent4: Being chosen as the cupbearer for the gods was like being elevated to a divine position, just like Ganymedes.
meanings.sent5: The image of Ganymedes serving drinks to the gods is etched in the minds of many storytellers.

meanings.definition: A type of large, goblet-shaped drinking glass.
meanings.sent1: The banquet hall was filled with elegant ganymedes, ready to be filled with delicious beverages.
meanings.sent2: The waiter carefully placed the ganymedes on the table, each one gleaming in the candlelight.
meanings.sent3: The ganymedes clinked together as the guests raised their glasses in a toast.
meanings.sent4: The ganymedes reflected the golden hues of the sunset, creating a magical atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The host gifted each guest a personalized ganymedes as a token of appreciation for attending the party.
